competitors.name: Cooper's Hawk Winery & Restaurant- Burr Ridge

businessProfile.name: Stix & Stones Wood Fired Pizza
businessProfile.address: 505 Village Center Dr D9, Burr Ridge, IL 60527, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 505 Village Center Dr D9, Burr Ridge, IL 60527, USA

reviews.text: Amazing wood fired pizza, and their other menu items are delicious as well. I personally love the white sauce pizzas - delicious, can‚Äôt get it like this anywhere else around. Reasonable prices for quality eats which is hard to find these days! They are doing a whole lotta things right at this place - keep up the good work.

Very good authentic wood fire pizza and a huge brownie for dessert! There was a coupon available so it was only 20 bucks. I highly recommend them as the ingredients are High quality and very delicious! I will surely be back when I‚Äôm in town again!

Heading to Midway from St Louis and wanted to eat before we got too close to the city. This place is just 3 min off I-55, so very convenient and lots of parking. Service was quick, food is delicious, and the staff was probably the friendliest bunch we have run into in years. My wife mis-ordered our pizza - no problem - they gave us some prosciutto to put on top, even though it was our mistake. At least 4 of them then stopped by our table to see if everything was OK. And they also sell ice cream - the perfect ending to a delicious meal. Great salad, soup, and of course, the wonderful pizza. If you're local, go often, but if you're cruising down I-55 and a bit hungry, it's definitely worth a stop, and it won't wreck your budget or your schedule.

Amazing food and great atmosphere! The wrap was fresh and flavorful, with creamy mozzarella, crisp greens, and delicious pesto. Paired with Kettle chips and a refreshing drink, it was the perfect meal. Highly recommend!

After not being here since 2019 we decided to go again.  Unfortunately it didn‚Äôt live up to past experiences.  When ordering I noticed all of the beer tap handles were removed, no problem I asked what beer and wine they had available.  The person behind the counter informed me that the new owners have decided to remove alcohol from the menu.

After ordering our sausage and pepperoni pizza it came out fairly quickly.  There was far more crust without ingredients than in the past and less cheese.  The crust was good the rest of the pizza was average at best.  For the price there are far better options in the area.  With the lack of beer and wine options we will not be back.

editorial_summary.overview: Easygoing Italian joint offering wood-fired pizza with creative toppings alongside ample salads.

recentReviews.author: Will Coop
recentReviews.text: Heading to Midway from St Louis and wanted to eat before we got too close to the city. This place is just 3 min off I-55, so very convenient and lots of parking. Service was quick, food is delicious, and the staff was probably the friendliest bunch we have run into in years. My wife mis-ordered our pizza - no problem - they gave us some prosciutto to put on top, even though it was our mistake. At least 4 of them then stopped by our table to see if everything was OK. And they also sell ice cream - the perfect ending to a delicious meal. Great salad, soup, and of course, the wonderful pizza. If you're local, go often, but if you're cruising down I-55 and a bit hungry, it's definitely worth a stop, and it won't wreck your budget or your schedule.

recentReviews.author: Randy Lynn
recentReviews.text: Amazing wood fired pizza, and their other menu items are delicious as well. I personally love the white sauce pizzas - delicious, can‚Äôt get it like this anywhere else around. Reasonable prices for quality eats which is hard to find these days! They are doing a whole lotta things right at this place - keep up the good work.

recentReviews.author: Jacob Donmyer
recentReviews.text: Very good authentic wood fire pizza and a huge brownie for dessert! There was a coupon available so it was only 20 bucks. I highly recommend them as the ingredients are High quality and very delicious! I will surely be back when I‚Äôm in town again!

recentReviews.author: amer maw
recentReviews.text: Amazing food and great atmosphere! The wrap was fresh and flavorful, with creamy mozzarella, crisp greens, and delicious pesto. Paired with Kettle chips and a refreshing drink, it was the perfect meal. Highly recommend!

recentReviews.author: Carl Day
recentReviews.text:
After not being here since 2019 we decided to go again.  Unfortunately it didn‚Äôt live up to past experiences.  When ordering I noticed all of the beer tap handles were removed, no problem I asked what beer and wine they had available.  The person behind the counter informed me that the new owners have decided to remove alcohol from the menu.

After ordering our sausage and pepperoni pizza it came out fairly quickly.  There was far more crust without ingredients than in the past and less cheese.  The crust was good the rest of the pizza was average at best.  For the price there are far better options in the area.  With the lack of beer and wine options we will not be back.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.6/5 rating across 5 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the authentic wood-fired pizza and unique white sauce pizzas that can't be found anywhere else nearby. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The restaurant offers quick service and is conveniently located just off I-55 with ample parking, making it an ideal stop for travelers. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility

The staff is exceptionally friendly and accommodating, going above and beyond to ensure customer satisfaction, even correcting order mistakes with generosity. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Lack of beer and wine options leading to customer dissatisfaction - social media marketing can improve this area
Perception of poor value compared to competitors - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
Negative experience impacting return visits - review management can address this concern
